channel.title: We Used to be Fun...
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about our family of four where we discuss parenting, life events, argue about stuff, and hear from our adorable children.
channel.itunes:author: Levi and Amy
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about our family of four where we discuss parenting, life events, argue about stuff, and hear from our adorable children.
channel.description: A podcast about our family of four where we discuss parenting, life events, argue about stuff, and hear from our adorable children.

item.title: We're back!
item.itunes:title: We're back!
item.itunes:author: Levi and Amy
item.itunes:subtitle: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. Thi...
item.itunes:summary: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.description: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

item.title: 4th of July Special Kids Edition
item.itunes:title: 4th of July Special Kids Edition
item.description: In this special edition, Amy chats with the kids about Independence Day (the holiday, not the movie), their thoughts on the coronavirus pandemic, daddy's work, their favorite books, Star Wars characters, vacation discussion, and favorite songs. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: In this special edition, Amy chats with the kids about Independence Day (the holiday, not the movie), their thoughts on the coronavirus pandemic, daddy's work, their favorite books, Star Wars characters, vacation discussion, and favorite songs. item.title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 3
item.itunes:title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 3
item.description: The third and final episode of this series. Mostly more rapid fire, but it was getting pretty late and everyone was a little tipsy, hungry, and volume levels varied significantly! Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: The third and final episode of this series. Mostly more rapid fire, but it was getting pretty late and everyone was a little tipsy, hungry, and volume levels varied significantly! Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

item.title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 2
item.itunes:title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 2
item.description: The Janey laughs edition. Why is Levi so great? Let us count the ways... Also, some fun "rapid fire" questions, Janey gets drunk, we discuss Cooler Ranch Doritos, do you cake or pie, and we compare birth stats. Enjoy! Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: The Janey laughs edition. Why is Levi so great? Let us count the ways... Also, some fun "rapid fire" questions, Janey gets drunk, we discuss Cooler Ranch Doritos, do you cake or pie, and we compare birth stats. Enjoy! Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

item.title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 1
item.itunes:title: Good ole Family Podcasting, part 1
item.description: Grandma Laurie, Aunt Kelly, Aunt Janey, and cousin Emma join our podcast for some fun and entertaining discussion, but then it gets real, then it doesn't, then it does again. Such a rollercoaster of emotion! Also, Janey laughs a lot. Recorded in mid-December 2019. Tune in next time for part 2! Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: Grandma Laurie, Aunt Kelly, Aunt Janey, and cousin Emma join our podcast for some fun and entertaining discussion, but then it gets real, then it doesn't, then it does again. item.title: Not So Rapid Fire
item.itunes:title: Not So Rapid Fire
item.description: Amy convinces Levi to drink hard liquor and answer questions... never again. We discuss some political contenders (FYI, this was recorded a couple of months ago, but just finally got it edited), then we ask the kids about our summer vacation, activities, school, etc. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: Amy convinces Levi to drink hard liquor and answer questions... never again. item.title: The deuce message.
item.itunes:title: The deuce message.
item.description: We're on iTunes! Amy gives an update on the WSU strike (which is over now, but wasn't as of this recording). Charlie Brown is hilarious. We play a game of "what words we'd use to describe eachother", which goes exactly as we should've expected, and Kyla talks about her favorite foods. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

item.title: That guy, he's a douche.
item.itunes:title: That guy, he's a douche.
item.description:
What are bad habits that we selfishly want to let our kids do, even if its not good for them? What are our least favorite parenting responsibilities, and favorite things to do as a family? We eat some kettle cooked potato chips whilst podcasting, argue about what age kids should get a tv and/or cell phone, Amy trash talks Steve Jobs (may he rest in peace), and the kids do animal impressions.

Comments or questions you want us to tackle? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

Comments or questions you want us to tackle? twitter.com/weusedtobefun

item.title: Sh*% got real
item.itunes:title: Sh*% got real
item.description: Things get serious in episode 2. Amy discusses the WSU strike, we go over some parenting triumphs and fails, and the kids do impressions of movie characters.

item.title: Our first episode!
item.itunes:title: Our first episode!
item.description: Let's talk about why and how are we going to do this podcast, some dogs we've had, horses, and an in-depth child review of Mulan II (2004).
item.content:encoded: Let's talk about why and how are we going to do this podcast, some dogs we've had, horses, and an in-depth child review of Mulan II (2004).
